publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2914.1 Bruce Crawford: GM Crop Trials—As an amendment to motion S1M-2914 in the name of Iain Smith, leave out from second "that" to end and insert ", with grave concern, that the Scottish Executive has approved the planting of a GM oilseed rape crop at three trial sites in Scotland this spring and encourages ministers to take full responsibility for Scotland’s environment by using the devolved powers available to them to reverse their environmentally-damaging decision."
S1M-2914.1 GM Crop Trials (lodged on 18 March 2002) Robin Harper*

S1M-2914.1 Bruce Crawford: GM Crop Trials—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2914) in the name of Iain Smith, leave out from second "that" to end and insert ", with grave concern, that the Scottish Executive has approved the planting of a GM oilseed rape crop at three trial sites in Scotland this spring and encourages ministers to take full responsibility for Scotland’s environment by using the devolved powers available to them to reverse their environmentally-damaging decision." Supported by: Robin Harper, Michael Russell*
